live_updates: Our teams have resolved the issue. Thank you for your patience!

Our technicians have been able to restore service to roughly half the affected customers and are continuing to work to get the rest online as soon as possible. We appreciate your continued patience. Thank you
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
56963.summary: Some customers in the Clearbrook area of Abbotsford are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56963.title: Jan 15 - Abbotsford (Clearbrook) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Services have been stabilized and the issue is now resolved. We thank you for your patience during the interruption.

Teams have confirmed a power outage is present in the area affecting our equipment. Please refer to your local power company for any updates. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Our next update will be after the power is restored.
56971.summary: Some customers in the Kerrisdale, and Shaughnessy areas of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56971.title: Jan 15 - Vancouver (Kerrisdale & Shaughnessy) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Our crews have restored services to the area. Thank you for your patience!
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
56973.summary: Some customers in the Cambie area of Richmond are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56973.title: Jan 15 - Richmond (Cambie) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
